thread.title_full: CeX/WeBuy - United Kingdom reviewed by Edward

author: Edward
title: Edward
text: Whenever I'm in town I will go to CEX and see what they are selling more often than no I will se something I want at a great price in there and buy it. I saw a computer graphics card for Â£2 the other day! Their online is amazing as well I got an email saying 3-5 working days it was here the next day. I highly recommend CEX for anything technology related you want to buy.
